short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalistic HTTP Client for API Development and Testing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Restfox is a minimalistic HTTP Client for API Development and Testing. Which gets out of your way and keeps things simple.

Features:
- Workspaces
- Tabs
- Nested Folders
- Lots of context menus
- Response history
- Plugins
- GraphQL support
- Import collections exported from Postman and Insomnia
- Simple user friendly interface
